resources.string: Click to start, long click to uninstall
No game data files were found in the archive!\nPlease select another archive.
No file manager found!\nPlease install one.

Stratagus is a real-time strategy gaming engine that supports following games:\ Wargus, War1gus, Stargus and Aleona\'s Tales\n\ To actually play anything you will need to generate \'game data files\' on your computer and copy them to your device. Please visit https://drodin.com/stratagus for instructions.\n\ Controls: Touch/click a unit to select it, touch/click and drag to select multiple units.\ Use on-screen controls (bottom left) or keyboard for unit actions.\ Drag map with two fingers or by pressing and holding middle mouse button.
